events.message: I just received the new blender I ordered, but it arrived with a cracked glass jar and does not work properly. This is very disappointing given the cost.
The issue has been identified as a product defect related to a broken appliance component.
Assigning this case to the product quality support team for further assistance.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the cracked jar on your blender. I'll do my best to assist you with this issue.
Could you please provide photos of the damage and confirm if the blender was used before noticing the crack?
Yes, I noticed the crack immediately upon opening the package. I have attached several photos showing the damage to the glass jar.
Thank you for the details. We can send you a replacement jar at no extra cost or offer a full product replacement if you prefer.
I would prefer to receive the replacement jar as soon as possible. Thanks for the prompt response and help.
We have processed your replacement jar order and it will be shipped within 24 hours. You will receive tracking details shortly.
Just checking in to confirm you received the replacement jar and everything is working correctly now.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and it fits perfectly. The blender works great now. Thanks again for the support!
We are closing your case as the issue has been resolved to your satisfaction. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
